TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Piyuma, title = Piyuma, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Piyuma} }

S.FORM: Piyuma i Pingtung a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Piyuma. u kasalumaluma' nu Piyuma sa, 168 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 716 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 702 ku tademaw, pakalatu 98 . u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 14 ku tademaw, pakalatu 2 . u kasabinacadan, Paiwan 93 , Amis 1 , zumazuma 3 . malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan
